descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
Basic concepts of linear algebra. Solutions of systems of linear equations; vectors and matrices; subspaces, linear independence, and bases; determinants; eigenvalues and eigenvectors; other topics and applications as time permits. Students may not receive credit for both 240 and 281-3, 285-1, 290-1, or 291-1.
Prerequisite: 230.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
ISBN: 978-0321982384 Linear Algebra and Its Applications, 5th ed
David Lay
Pearson

ISBN: 978-0321982575 Student Study Guide for Linear Algebra and Its Applications, 5th ed
David Lay
Pearson

descriptions.name: Class Notes
descriptions.value: Students may not receive credit for both 240 and 281-3, 285-1, 290-1, 291-1, GEN ENG 205-1, or GEN ENG 206-1.
